class.name: VirtualJoystick
class.brief_description: A virtual joystick control for touch screen devices.

members.member: The action to trigger when the joystick is moved down.
The action to trigger when the joystick is moved left.
The action to trigger when the joystick is moved right.
The action to trigger when the joystick is moved up.
The size of the area in which the joystick tip can move.
The size of the area in which the joystick tip must move before it is considered active.
The initial position of the joystick as a ratio of the control's size. (0,0) is top-left, (1,1) is bottom-right.
The joystick mode to use (must be one of [constant JOYSTICK_FIXED], [constant JOYSTICK_DYNAMIC], or [constant JOYSTICK_FOLLOWING]).
The size of the joystick in pixels.
The texture to use for the joystick base. When null, a circle will be drawn instead with the color in the theme.
The texture to use for the joystick tip. When null, a circle will be drawn instead with the color in the theme.

signal.name: flick_canceled
signal.description: Emitted when the tip enters the deadzone after being outside of it.

signal.name: flicked
signal.description: Emitted when the tip moved outside the deadzone and the joystick is released.

signal.name: pressed
signal.description: Emitted when the joystick is pressed.

signal.name: released
signal.description: Emitted when the joystick is released.

signal.name: tapped
signal.description: Emitted when the joystick is released without moving the tip.

constants.constant: The joystick is moved to the initial touch position as long as it's within the joystick's rect. It moves back to its original position when released.

The joystick is moved to the initial touch position as long as it's within the joystick's rect. It will follow the touch input if it goes outside the joystick's range. It moves back to its original position when released.
The joystick is only visible on touchscreen devices.
The joystick is only visible when being touched.
